model._description: Warm start model settings for the inference.

_value._description: This warm start setting restores the whole variables.

model._description: The model from which to warm-start the model parameters.

vars_to_warm_start._description: Regular expressions for the name of trainable variables. Multiple expressions can be assigned by comma. Default is '.*' (all variables)

load_only_trainable_vars._description: If checked, only trainable variables in the model graph are considered. If not checked, all variables are considered.

checkpoint_exclude_scopes._description: Scopes to exclude in the checkpoint.

_value.name: BasicWarmStart

output_path._description: path to saving results of inference job.

output_overwrite._description: If checked, output file will be overwritten when there exists another file in the same path. Otherwise, an error will be raised.

html_path._description: path to saving summary results of this simulation job.

outjson._description: path to saving summary data of this simulation job.

label_key._description: Probability tensor key in labels. If labels is a tensor, use 'labels'. If labels is a dictionary of tensor, use 'labels.key_name'.

probability_key._description: Probability tensor key in predictions. If predictions is a tensor, use 'predictions'. If labels is a dictionary of tensor, use 'predictions.key_name'.

pos_labels._description: Comma separated positive labels for roc, pr curve.

cnf_mat_overlay_text._description: If True, the numbers of elements in the confusion matrix will be displayed.

prediction_weights._description: Comma separated prediction weights. Prediction class is determined by argmax(probs/prediction_weights).

input_predict_keys._description: Feature or label keys to be contained in the prediction, comma separated. ex features.image, labels for the case features is a dictionary containing image and labels is a tensor.

predict_keys._description: Prediction keys to be contained in the prediction, comma separated. If not specified, all the predictions will be predicted. ex) Suppose that predictions is a dictionary containing probabilities and prediction and that want to output predictions.probabilities only. Then use this parameter filled with predictions.probabilities here.

use_gpu._description: Whether GPU is used for the inference job.

intra_op_parallelism_threads._description: The execution of an individual op (for some op types) can be parallelized on a pool of intra_op_parallelism_threads. 0 means the system picks an appropriate number.

inter_op_parallelism_threads._description: Nodes that perform blocking operations are enqueued on a pool of inter_op_parallelism_threads available in each process. 0 means the system picks an appropriate number.
